RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 89. Claiming Purse 15400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Enter ed For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at Five Furlon gs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COURT AND SPARK was reserved early, came five wide into the lane and closed full of run to draw clear late under mild urging. BRIT'S CANDYMAN stalked the pace four wide and made a four wide bid off the tu8rn buy needed more while getting the place award. CASH IN A FLASH vied for the lead on the inside and made a bid leaving the turn but could not go with the winner late, lost place award late. SPEEDY MOONLITE vied for the lead in between rivals and faded in the drive. STANHOPE was well placed on the inside, cut the corner leaving the turn but was blocked to the furlong marker and lost all chance. NAUTICAL NATURE was allowed to settle early and lacked a rally. KING ECLIPTICAL vied for the lead three wide and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Nautical Nature
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Cash in a Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, bid upper stretch, lost 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Moonlite
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead between horses, 2 wide upper stretch, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Court and Spark
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came 5 wide, closed, drew clear, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Stanhope
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, cut corner, blocked 3/16-1/8, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: King Ecliptical
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Straw Stable and Martin Kaci
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Brit's Candyman
ENTRY.OWNER: Kenwood Racing LLC and Paterpop Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, got 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 5F Turf CR: 87. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the most starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIERCE AND STRONG was well rated early, made a four wide move to take over nearing the furlong marker, then held off SUPER ROCKER late to prove best, driving. SUPER ROCKER was settled early towards the inside, eased out on the turn, came five wide into the lane while advancing, closed well but could not get to the winner, good effort. U KANT WHIP IT was well placed on the inside, then was in tight by the furlong marker and was up for the show award on the inside late. SHORTY MAC set the pace on the inside and then was headed by the quarter pole then gave way grudgingly in the drive. DECLARATION TIME tracked the pace from between rivals, blocked leaving the turn, angled out by the furlong marker and had some late gain. WHERESTHEPASSION was reserved early, came five wide into the lane and had a belated rally. POWER AGENDA stalked the pace four wide and made a three wide bid on the turn but weakened in the drive. GALILEE failed to menace. MIZZEN MONEY dropped back. RACE WAS HAND TIMED

ENTRY.NAME: Super Rocker
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, eased out turn, came 5 wide, closed

ENTRY.NAME: U Kant Whip It
ENTRY.OWNER: Kenwood Racing LLC and Degaetano and Pastore Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, in tight stretch, got 3rd inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Declaration Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked between horses, blocked 3/16, angled out, late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Galilee
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Power Agenda
ENTRY.OWNER: Pleasant Fields at Harmony Hill LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Wheresthepassion
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came 5 wide, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Shorty Mac
ENTRY.OWNER: Rogers Ronald W and Rogers Tyler
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed 1/4, gave way grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Fierce and Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, 4 wide move, led 1/8, held on, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M Turf CR: 77. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lb s.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) Preference to horses with the m ost starts at Penn National since May 31st 2022. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course it will be run on the main track at One Mile. If more than 10 horses remain it will be run at One Mile and Seventy Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IMNOTONETOCOMPLAIN was allowed to settle early, between rivals on the turn, then made a two wide bid off the turn spliting rivals and drerw clear to prove best under a drive. MELITZA was settled early, saved ground on the turn, was boxed by the quarter pole, split rivals nearing the furlong marker and rallied. AFRICAN ANGEL was rated on the outside, made a four wide move on the turn but flattened out in the lane. KEYSTONE WARRIOR was reserved early, made a five wide move on the turn but had no late kick. DESI'S REWARD was reserved early made a six wide move by the quarter pole but needed more in the lane. THAT'STONY'SSISTER vied for the lead on the inside and then tracked the pace on the inside and weakened. MY MASTERPIECE was three wide into the first turn, vied for the early lead three wide, then set a pressured pace off the inside, then faded while being bothered by the furlong marker. SWEET MESA was five wide into the first turn, pressed the pace four wide and tired. BABKA chased the early pace on the inside and weakened. SHEA D SECRET showed little. THE RIDER ON MY MASTERPIECE CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST AFRICAN ANGEL, AFTER THE STEWARDS REVIEWED THE REPLAYS THEY ALLOWED THE CLAIM OF FOUL AND DISQUALIFIED AFRICAN ANGEL FROM THIRD AND PLACED HER SEVENTH.

ENTRY.NAME: Imnotonetocomplain
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, between turn, split rivals upper, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Babka
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: That'stony'ssister
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, saved ground turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Melitza
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, boxed 1/4, split rivals 1/8, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Keystone Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 5 wide move turn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: My Masterpiece
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, vied 3 wide, set pressured, bothered 1/8,faded

ENTRY.NAME: Desi's Reward
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, wide move turn, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: dq-African Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated outside, 4 wide move, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Mesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide first turn, pressed 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Shea D Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 28. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WARRIOR IN CHIEF was sent to the front to set the early pace while clear, then was was well handled, headed nearing the furlong marker and dug in gamely and edged clear to prove best, driving. C C'S WARRIOR stalked the early pace two wide, made a three wide bid off the turn and went on even terms for command by the furlong marker but hung, held place award late. SUPER DUDE tracked the pace three wide, fell off the pace by the quarter pole, then angled in by the furlong marker and was gaining late. LAKE NAKURU was settled early, saved ground on the turn and made a mild bid on the inside to the furlong marker but needed more late. AMOUNT bumped at the start, settled back and passed the tiring rivals. DIGGERS DIAMOND was settled early and weakened. HASHTAG WINNING was settled three wide and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Diggers Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Nakuru
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, mild bid inside, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Amount
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, void early speed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: C C's Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 2 wide, bid 3 wide, hung late, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Hashtag Winning
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle 3 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior in Chief
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to lead, set pace inside, headed 1/8, dug in, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Super Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, angled in 1/8, gaining late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 30. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where En tered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANNAMATED MOON set the early pace on the inside, drew off on the turn and then was kept clear to the wire under a mild drive. NICK THE CARDSHARK was settled early, made a four wide move by the quarter pole, then finished well to be clearly second best. VIOLENT PASS chased the pace on the inside and weakened, bested rest. TOMATER GATOR pressed the winner three wide early and weakened. FIRE DOWN BELOW was reserved early, four wide on the turn and had no rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Violent Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, weakened, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Annamated Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, drew off turn, kept clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Nick the Cardshark
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early, 4 wide 1/4 pole, rallied, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Fire Down Below
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 4 wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Tomater Gator
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 72. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRIPLE TITOS was allowed to settle on the inside, advanced on the inside on the turn, angled off the inside by the quarter pole, came five wide into the lane and closed well to edged clear under a drive. SUNSHINE HARRY vied for the lead three wide, then dueled for the lead two wide on the turn, made a bid off the turn to gain a short lead but was out-kicked by the winner late. HEXAGON rushed up on the inside to vie for command, then dueled for the lead on the turn, weakened the final furlong. ON THE RIM vied for the early lead in between rivals, rated back, then made a three wide bid by the quarter pole but faded the final furlong. MILLBANK MAN chased the pace three to four wide and came five wide into the ;and had no rally. BOSS HOLIDAY broke in the air at the start, then was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Triple Titos
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, angled out 1/4, came 5 wide, closed, up

ENTRY.NAME: Hexagon
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up inside, vied, dueled inside, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in air, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: On the Rim
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, rated back, bid 3 wide, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Sunshine Harry
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, dueled 2 wide, bid 2 wide, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Millbank Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, 4 wide 1/4 pole, came 5 wide, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 28. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS LOYALTY was reserved early, made a bid move on the inside on the turn, then had to check and wait for room leaving the turn, then slipped through the inside to make a bid and edged clear late to prove best, driving. SERENE WARRIOR set a slow pressured pace on the inside, then shook clear by the quarter pole, but let the winner through on the inside leaving the turn and was outfinished. LONDONDERRY was well rated on the inside, swung out three wide leaving the turn and had no kick, got show award. CHAMPAGNE SISTER pressed the pace two to three wide and weakened in the drive. HIT A HOMER HONEY tracked the pace and made a three to four wide bid off the turn but weakened in the drive. HALLIGIRL chased the pace and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Londonderry
ENTRY.OWNER: Cirexis Stable and Rodriguez Miguel A
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, swung 3 wide, no kick, got show

ENTRY.NAME: Hit a Homer Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, bid 3-4 wide, weakened stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Serene Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured slow pace, shook clear 1/4, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Champagne Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2-3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Loyalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, big move inside turn, checked upper, bid inside, up

ENTRY.NAME: Halligirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, tired
